articles.description: Oliver Voysey, 13, from Newcastle upon Tyne, who suffered a brain injury at two days old  renamed presenters Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield 'Bob and Cheryl' on ITV's This Morning.
articles.content: A boy who suffered a catastrophic brain injury at just two days old won over the hearts of the nation after renaming presenters Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield 'Bob and Cheryl' on This Morning… [+4358 chars]

articles.title: Dancing on Ice announces final celebrities joining 2022 line-up - Digital Spy
articles.description: The cast is now complete.
articles.content:
Dancing on Ice has completed its 2022 line-up, after announcing the final two celebrities for the new series.
